[i]Bargain[/i] – Spells you cast have bargain. If you pay their bargain cost, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card until the end of your next turn.
[i]Iron Blade[/i] – At the beginning of your end step, if you have exiled a card from your library this turn, Shannam deals 4 damage to target player.
